item.text: Meanwhile, when many thousands of the crowd had gathered so that they were trampling on one another, Jesus began to speak first to his disciples, “Be on your guard against the yeast of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy.

<st data-num="3762" class="">Nothing</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4780" class="">hidden</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> nothing is <st data-num="2927" class="">secret</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1097">made known</st>.
So then whatever you have said in the dark will be heard in the light, and what you have whispered in private rooms will be proclaimed from the housetops.
“I tell you, my friends, do not be afraid of those who kill the body, and after that have nothing more they can do.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I will <st data-num="5263" class="">warn</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">whom</st> you should <st data-num="5399" class="">fear:</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">Fear</st> the one who, <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="615" class="">killing</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> to <st data-num="1685" class="">throw</st> you<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1067" class="">hell</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">him</st>!

<st data-num="3780" class="">Aren’t</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="4765" class="">sparrows</st> <st data-num="4453" class="">sold</st> for <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="787" class="">pennies</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1950" class="">forgotten</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316">God</st>.<n id="2" />
In fact, even the hairs on your head are all numbered. Do not be afraid; you are more valuable than many sparrows.
“I tell you, whoever acknowledges me before men, the Son of Man will also acknowledge before God’s angels.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who <st data-num="720" class="">denies</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> will be <st data-num="533" class="">denied</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3004">speaks</st> a <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will be <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the person who <st data-num="987" class="">blasphemes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="1533" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st>,<n id="1" /> the<n id="2" /> <st data-num="746" class="">rulers</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">authorities</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3309" class="">worry</st> about <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> you should make your <st data-num="626" class="">defense</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you should <st data-num="3004">say</st>,
for the Holy Spirit will teach you at that moment what you must say.”
Then someone from the crowd said to him, “Teacher, tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="444">Man</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2525" class="">made</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> a <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3312" class="">arbitrator</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">between</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> two?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3708" class="">Watch out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5442" class="">guard</st> yourself <st data-num="575" class="">from</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956">all types of</st> <st data-num="4124" class="">greed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> one’s <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">consist</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4052" class="">abundance</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5224" class="">possessions</st>.”

He <st data-num="1161" class="">then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> a <st data-num="3850" class="">parable:</st><n id="2" /> “The <st data-num="5561" class="">land</st> of a <st data-num="5100" class="">certain</st> <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> produced<n id="3" /> an <st data-num="2164">abundant crop</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">so</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1260" class="">thought</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="5101">What</st> should I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nowhere</st> to <st data-num="4863" class="">store</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">crops?’</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘I<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st> I will <st data-num="2507">tear down</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="596" class="">barns</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> <st data-num="3173">bigger ones</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> I will <st data-num="4863" class="">store</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> my <st data-num="4621" class="">grain</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="18" class="">goods</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I will <st data-num="3004">say</st> to <st data-num="5590" class="">myself</st>,<n id="1" /> “You <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">plenty</st> of <st data-num="18" class="">goods</st> <st data-num="2749">stored up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years;</st> <st data-num="373" class="">relax</st>, <st data-num="5315" class="">eat</st>, <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>, <st data-num="2165" class="">celebrate!”’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘You <st data-num="878" class="">fool</st>! <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> very <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st><n id="1" /> will be <st data-num="523">demanded back</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">get</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you have <st data-num="2090" class="">prepared</st> for yourself?’<n id="3" />
So it is with the one who stores up riches for himself, but is not rich toward God.”
Then Jesus said to his disciples, “Therefore I tell you, do not worry about your life, what you will eat, or about your body, what you will wear.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4183">more</st> to <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> than <st data-num="5160" class="">food</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> more to the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> than <st data-num="1742" class="">clothing</st>.

<st data-num="2657" class="">Consider</st> the <st data-num="2876" class="">ravens:</st><n id="1" /> They do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5009" class="">storeroom</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="596" class="">barn</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="5142" class="">feeds</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. <st data-num="4214">How much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="1308" class="">valuable</st> are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> than the <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st>!

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> by <st data-num="3309">worrying</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="4369" class="">add</st> an <st data-num="4083" class="">hour</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2244" class="">life</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="3761 1410">cannot</st> do such a <st data-num="1646" class="">very little thing</st> as this, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> do you <st data-num="3309" class="">worry</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st>?

<st data-num="2657" class="">Consider</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> the <st data-num="2918" class="">flowers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="837" class="">grow;</st> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2872" class="">work</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3514" class="">spin</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">Yet</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3761">not even</st> <st data-num="4672" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> was <st data-num="4016" class="">clothed</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st>!

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779">this is how</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="294" class="">clothes</st> the <st data-num="68" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="5528" class="">grass</st>,<n id="2" /> which <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> here<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="839" class="">tomorrow</st> is <st data-num="906" class="">tossed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the fire to heat the <st data-num="2823" class="">oven</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4214">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st><n id="5" /> will he <st data-num="294" class="">clothe</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>, you <st data-num="3640">people of little faith</st>!

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2212">overly concerned about</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you will <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you will <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3349" class="">worry about</st> such things.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1934" class="">pursue</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="5535" class="">need</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">them</st>.
Instead, pursue his kingdom, and these things will be given to you as well.
“Do not be afraid, little flock, for your Father is well pleased to give you the kingdom.

<st data-num="4453" class="">Sell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5224" class="">possessions</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1654">to the poor</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">Provide</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="905" class="">purses</st> that do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3822">wear out</st>—a <st data-num="2344" class="">treasure</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="3" /> that <st data-num="413">never decreases</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st> <st data-num="1448" class="">approaches</st> <st data-num="3761">and no</st> <st data-num="4597" class="">moth</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1311" class="">destroys</st>.
For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
“Get dressed for service and keep your lamps burning;

be <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4327" class="">waiting for</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> to <st data-num="360">come back</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1062">wedding celebration</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> when he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2925" class="">knocks</st>, they can <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="455">open the door</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="3107" class="">Blessed</st> are <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> their <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> <st data-num="1127" class="">alert</st><n id="2" /> when he <st data-num="2064" class="">returns</st>! I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="3" /> he will <st data-num="4024" class="">dress himself to serve</st>,<n id="4" /> have <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="347">take their place at the table</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="3928" class="">come</st><n id="6" /> and <st data-num="1247">wait on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>!<n id="7" />

<st data-num="2579" class="">Even if</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="2579" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">watch of the night</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> them <st data-num="3779">alert</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3107" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1565">those slaves</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="3617">owner of the house</st> had <st data-num="1492" class="">known</st> at <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> the <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>, he would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="863" class="">let</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> be <st data-num="1358">broken into</st>.
You also must be ready because the Son of Man will come at an hour when you do not expect him.”
Then Peter said, “Lord, are you telling this parable for us or for everyone?”

The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="686">then</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> and <st data-num="5429" class="">wise</st> <st data-num="3623" class="">manager</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="2525">puts in charge</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2322">household servants</st>,<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> them their <st data-num="4620">allowance of food</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2540">proper time</st>?

<st data-num="3107" class="">Blessed</st> is <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st> <st data-num="4160">at work</st><n id="2" /> when he <st data-num="2064" class="">returns</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="230" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> the master<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2525">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in charge <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5225">possessions</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> should <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2588 846">himself</st>,<n id="3" /> ‘<st data-num="1473">My</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> is <st data-num="5549" class="">delayed</st><n id="4" /> in <st data-num="2064" class="">returning,’</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="757">begins</st> to <st data-num="5180" class="">beat</st><n id="5" /> the other<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3816" class="">slaves</st>, both men <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3814" class="">women</st>,<n id="7" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>, <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3182">get drunk</st>,

then the <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> of <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> when he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4328" class="">expect</st> him <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> an <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">foresee</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="1371" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1371">in two</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">assign</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3313">place</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="571" class="">unfaithful</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1565" class="">That</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1401" class="">servant</st> who <st data-num="1097" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2962">master’s</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2090">get ready</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> what <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> master <st data-num="2307" class="">asked</st><n id="2" /> will receive a <st data-num="4183" class="">severe</st> <st data-num="1194" class="">beating</st>.

But the one who did not know his master’s will and did things worthy of punishment will receive a light beating. From everyone who has been given much, much will be required, and from the one who has been entrusted with much, even more will be asked.
“I have come to bring fire on the earth—and how I wish it were already kindled!

I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="907" class="">undergo</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> <st data-num="4912">distressed</st> I am <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> it is <st data-num="5055" class="">finished</st>!

Do you <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> I have <st data-num="3854" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="1325" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>? <st data-num="3780" class="">No</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="1267">division</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3568">now on</st><n id="1" /> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st> <st data-num="1266" class="">divided</st>, <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st>.

They will be divided, father against son and son against father, mother against daughter and daughter against mother, mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law and daughter-in-law against mother-in-law.”
Jesus also said to the crowds, “When you see a cloud rising in the west, you say at once, ‘A rainstorm is coming,’ and it does.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you see the <st data-num="3558">south wind</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4154" class="">blowing</st>, you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘There will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2742">scorching heat</st>,’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there <st data-num="1096" class="">is</st>.
You hypocrites! You know how to interpret the appearance of the earth and the sky, but how can you not know how to interpret the present time?
“And why don’t you judge for yourselves what is right?

<st data-num="5613" class="">As</st> you are <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="476" class="">accuser</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="758" class="">magistrate</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">make</st> an <st data-num="2039" class="">effort</st> to <st data-num="525" class="">settle</st> <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st>, <st data-num="3379">so that</st> he will <st data-num="3379" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2694" class="">drag</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> to the <st data-num="4233" class="">officer</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4233" class="">officer</st> <st data-num="906" class="">throw</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>.
I tell you, you will never get out of there until you have paid the very last cent!”
